## IResourceResponse interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Holds none, one, or many [Resources](./core.iresourcepayload.md) and is usually created via [IResponse.toResources()](./core.iresponse.toresources.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IResourceResponse<T extends IResourcePayload> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [toArray()](./core.iresourceresponse.toarray.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Create an Array of [Resources](./core.iresourcepayload.md)<!-- -->. Omits keys. |
